title: Gloria
description:
A web application providing a digital menu system that helps manage menus easily. Led the frontend team in designing and developing the user interface using React and Tailwind CSS. Collaborated closely with the backend team to ensure seamless integration and optimize performance. The project also involved implementing features for menu customization, real-time updates, and user management. Developed and maintained front-end using Next.js and TailwindCSS, optimized user experience leading to a 40% reduction in load time.
Implemented real-time notifications using Socket.io, enhancing user engagement by 20%.
